title: Multiple Complaints Around The State of the Game @RitoDevs
body:
Hey, so there are a few things that have been going on lately that many have been less than impressed with:

**1)** The IP/BE given from Level Up capsules are way too low. My last 5 capsules have gone as follows; 500 BE, 500 BE, 500 BE, 2 x 6300 champs (that gave me 630 BE from disenchanting), 600 BE. This is very disappointing as I was initially excited for the new 'runes' update due to the levelling system changes - but this is just unneeded, I thought that it was in addition to the IP that you used to get per match. (As it should be - even nerf the IP/BE per game a little and add this and it would have been balanced.)

**2)** The amount of bots in ARAM (I play in OCE - not sure about other regions). When we search for a game of ARAM we manage to get matched with at least 3 bots per game (these bots are set to auto-feed and ruin games). It has ruined the ARAM queue for all of us. Reports don't even do anything either because I've been matched with the same bot 6 or 7 times in one day.

Judging by the state that the game is in, this is the downfall of League of Legends. It sucks to say as I enjoy playing this game, but it is true. Rito has managed to ruin the game by not focusing on the problems present. Thanks for listening to my rant. Hope the devs will do something about it. Please upvote if you agree with me, this is so the devs can see it.
~ Mr. Zeroxs, fellow summoner on the rift.

My OCE Main: Mr Zeroxs
OCE Second:  Noxilian Prince

**[EDIT] So I have just heard that Riot has listened about the first point and will be buffing the system and also fix some other stuff. Read more about that [here.](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/developer-corner/BQed8FWz-leveling-and-rewards-improvements-to-milestone-emotes-capsules-fwotd)**

replies.body: Don't worry Mr Zeroxs you aren't part of the minority with this one, your opinion is on the same level as many, and all we can hope at this point is that something positive is done.
Hoping someone at Riot will notice that what they're doing to the game isn't for the better. Glad to hear many others share the same opinion. :)

I would say you're the minority with the exception of your BE point. I don't think many people like the lack of BE you get, we can agree on that. For your second point I've played a decent amount of aram (750 over 2 years) on a level 30 account and NEVER encountered a bot, maybe I'm just lucky...?

I do definitely disagree this is the downfall of League. When you stare at the problems in the game, you don't look at all of the positives and why people actually come and play the game. So many people I know personally have came back for preseason and due to the chaos and champs around esp new ones like Zoe, they don't care about the BE problem that much. A problem that is going to get fixed due to the amount of people crying online about it. The other games on the market have their own problems and things that can push people to other games, such as League. I mean I hear people complaining about BE and botting the most on things like boards and I mean, I just leveled an account from 10-30 by playing co-ops/norms and I only found bots in co-ops like once a day, it really wasn't often. The BE problem is being fixed, source: https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/developer-corner/BQed8FWz-leveling-and-rewards-improvements-to-milestone-emotes-capsules-fwotd

It's a pretty good improvement IMO, if people keep complaining after that, I'd say they'd give you more.

>"It sucks to say as I enjoy playing this game"

You enjoy the game even with the problems (that they're fixing)? Maybe that says something about the game. 

>"Rito has managed to ruin the game by not focusing on the problems present."

Riot have done an incredible job. They have focused and worked incredibly hard to fix the problems the game has. The only real problem in the game atm is BE, which they're fixing? If you look at everything they have done with adding so many things to the game that people have asked for, for yeaaaars e.g Practice tool, skin tab etc. I do think you're being kinda narrow-minded on this.

I'm happy to give you screenshots from my match history. I can guarantee that there are at least 10 matches with bots in. Here's one for example - notice their names and summoner spells. Also they all attempted to feed the other team (this is to get the games over faster - more games, more XP - the likelihood they'll win with auto-feeders is low, so they don't expect wins, the bots even start surrender votes sometimes).
[http://i64.tinypic.com/oiu1cl.png](http://i64.tinypic.com/oiu1cl.png)
Thank you for your response and I can definitely see your reasoning and points. :)

Thank you for your kindness, and idk I just never ever encounter them myself, even my lower ranked friends don't. I mean I've seen bots in aram before, playing with level 15s once, but it was only once. You must be super unlucky then or I'm super lucky lol.
Fair enough.. It's annoying for me because it's like that every game I play.

i have found and seen muitlple bots in aram buddy  game after game running clease and flash tbh its kinda how you know its a bot .... i understand people can run clease but i mean they dont talk respond to pings and run at the enemy and die, i do report them but i wish i could help in the anti bot part of this game. i think i could be a huge assest and for free in the way to find them and help make this a better game.
also awesome response to the other things just saying there are lots of bots during certain hours

I agree - I report them everytime and usually tell everyone else to... I've recently heard that Riot doesn't look at reports in ARAM and Co-op vs. AI. (Not sure about the legitimacy of these claims however.)

I'd also argue that the suspension settings are way over sensitive and abandoning the punishment tiers has been a real slap in the balls for a lot of regular players who are getting smashed in the teeth for one infraction after years of play.

Gets really annoying - I just worked mine off the other day.

yeah arams are a complete waste of time. 9 times out of ten you'll get a game wrecking bot and you just waste time while the game trudges towards its inevitable outcome or you get a ban. it is lame.

Fair enough... I believe that if you had the intention to leave the game early - that should be punishable but 20 minutes is ridiculous for bots, they should have a timer that is divided by 2. No one AFK's in Bots on purpose so why make punishments so severe?
how is getting 500be even possible.. they are alway multiplies of 90...
It didn't give me any shards, just "500 Blue Essence."

Lately, I can't even find the motivation to play League anymore. The XP given for first win is heaps but without it, it only gives very few XP. Players who grind for XP don't differ much as to those who play 3 - 5 games a day. I can also definitely agree with Mr Zeroxs that the champion capsules have been giving loads of 450 BE champs. The games vs the loot players get are much worse than before. 

Wasn't their intention to give players more champions so that they can expand their champion pool? 
The IP to BE change is great, but it doesn't last for long.

Thank you for giving your opinion! Now to hope Riot cares enough to have a look at the criticism, instead of telling themselves everything is okay - which is what they have been doing lately. I really would like to see this community stay - it's one of the few games I've enjoyed playing and the people make it much better. Would suck to see this fall.
Between the instabans for minor infractions and the encouragement of minors to engage in gambling, riot have really dropped the fucking ball in late 2017.
I agree. It's a shame too.
